english_translation: I saw the Messenger of Allah ﷺ and Aisha (may Allah be pleased with her) covered by a single cloth, half of it upon the Prophet ﷺ and half of it upon Aisha.

IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok
Topics: Family Life of the Prophet ﷺ

english_translation: Ask your families about small matters from the rulings when you come to them, for indeed I fear that you will ask them about something great and they will not be able to answer you, and that will cause alienation between you and them.

english_translation: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ was the best of people in character. He had a brother through fosterage among us called Abu Sayf who was a blacksmith. The Messenger of Allah ﷺ would visit him, and I would go with him.
